task.summary: Default task
feat: add entities, connection pool, repository for accounts, some specifications for accounts.

fix: loading into/from base account avatars.
feat: add course repository.

refactor: update ConnectionPool.
feat: add servlet and jsp on login page.

refactor: change field photo of the Account class to pathToPhoto and it's type to String. DB now keep link to the photo instead of object.
refactor: change specification package naming.
refactor: try-with-resources in AccRepository, segregate setting statement's parameters to separate method.
refactor: update chapter repository and specifications.
refactor: update all repositories.

feat: add course learning page.
feat: add lesson select on learning lesson page.
feat: add duration to lessons, duration and lessons amount to chapters and courses. Thier values are now updated on every db changes and displayed in the interface.

feat: add deposit by card to account balance option.
feat: add check payment history option.
style: update password changing page.
feat: add change photo option.
